title: ParticipantDataDescriptor
description: A ParticipantDataDescriptor represent the metadata of participant data.

id.description: The unique id assigned to this participant data descriptor

name.description: The name for this participant data descriptor

description.description: The optional description for this participant data descriptor

repeatType.description: The repeat type of this data type
repeatType.name: ParticipantDataRepeatType

repeatFrequency.description: The repeat frequency if repeat type is REPEATED (cron format)
repeatFrequency.name: ParticipantDataRepeatFrequency

datetimeStartColumnName.description: The (optional) name of column that holds the point of time or start of a time range used in time series

datetimeEndColumnName.description: The (optional) name of column that holds the end of a time range used in time series
